on reading compounds: 他【タ】other (esp. people and abstract matters)
他国【タコク】foreign country, other country, another province, strange land, alien land
自他【ジタ】oneself and others, transitive and intransitive
kun reading compounds: 他【ほか】other (place, thing, person), the rest, outside, beyond, nothing except, nothing but, nothing apart from, nothing aside from, no choice (but to), besides..., in addition to...
殊の外【ことのほか】exceedingly, extremely, exceptionally, unusually, unexpectedly
